inn1.comm: short and wide and worked down to third man with ease
short and straight and defnede to mid-wicket-area. No run taken though.
short and straight again, worked away to midwicket once more.
short of a length and straight this time. Defended off the frontfoot.
good line and length, good first over, no shot offered there.
just a bit too straight first up, worked down to fine leg.
short and wide and Kallis hammers the ball over point over the fence.
good line and length, no shot offered.
very well bowled, shortish and just outside off, movement from the seam and Kallis plays and misses.
short and straight, defended off the backfoot
short and straight, defended off the backfoot once more to end the over.
fullish and straight, pushed to cover and sets off early for a quick single.
defended off the frontfoot once more. Well bowled by Mpofu.
full and straight, driven straight to mid-on.
just pushed down the leg-side a bit there, Kallis attempts to flick the ball down to fine leg.
short and wide, Kallis rocks onto the backfoot quickly and hammeres the ball over mid-wicket.
short of a length and pretty straight, Kallis smacks the ball over mid-wicket with a lofted on-drive.
short and straight, punched to point and another easy single.
full and straight, defended to the on-side.
defended to cover-point off the backfoot this time.
wide down leg from the youngster.
full and straight, defended by Kallis.
too straight this time and Kallis flicks the ball down to fine leg.
short and straight again, pulled straight to mid-wicket.
short and straight, worked away to mid-wicket.
full and straight, hits the outside half of the bat and the ball runs away to point.
solid forward defence from Smith.
dropped at gully by Taylor. Thick edge from Smith flies to gully and he puts it down.
flicked away to fine leg and good fielding restricts them to just the single.
walks down the track and across the deck, just works the ball away to mid-wicket.
shortish and straight, Kallis flicks the ball to mid-wicket with ease.
another good delivery from Jarvis.
straight half-volley from Jarvis, driven straight but just slightly miss-timed. Fielded by mid-on.
Kallis comes down the track and hammers the ball past cover-point.
defended off the frontfoot.
wide outside off, attempted slower-delivery.
very good delivery to end off the over, quick and vouncy. 140km/h and Taibu takes the ball over his head.
defended the backfoot.
gives himself some room and smashes the ball straight through cover.
flicked through mid-wicket and gets an easy couple as square leg has to come around to do the fielding.
down the track from Smith again, god delivery from mpofu,nearly getting an edge there.
worked to fie leg this time and gets another easy single.
no shot offered by Kallis to end the over off.
bouncer, not a bad one either, 145km/h and bounces a bit too much. Flies over the keeper.
defended off the backfoot.
short from Jarvis, Smith pulls the ball over mid-wicket,
Smith waltzes down the track once more, misses this time.
good movement away from the batsmen.
short again and pulled away again. A bit of inexperience from Jarvis showing here.
another boundary to end off the over. Short and wide outside off this time, Smith hammers the ball past cover-point and nobody's going to stop that.
easy single to rotate the strike.
gives himself some room and drives the ball to mid-off.
flicked away ove mid-wicket once more and the ball nearly reaches the fence, one-bounce and the ball hits the advertisement boards.
worked away to deep square leg.
comes down the track and then defends.
another wide for a bouncer going over the batsman's head called.
driven to mid-on and an easy single follows.
short and straight, cut away powerfully but straight to gully.
pushed to mid-on and sets off immediately.
flicked to the on-side for another easy single.
cut away powerfully to cover-point.
Smith gives himself some room and driven straight to mid-off.
short and straight again from Jarvis, Smith pulls the ball away powerfully. The Proteas are after ten overs 66 for no loss.
defended off the frontfoot.
attempted little late cut down to third man, fielded well by backward point though.
well-bowled, solid forward defence from Kallis though
shortish and straight, flicked away to mid-wicket.
defended once more.
easy single to end off the over.
drivne to mid-on off the frontfoot.
half-volley, driven very powerfully but straight to cover. Missed out.
anggled down to third man, fielded by backward point.
worked to long-on for an easy single.
brushes the pad on it's way down to fine leg.
flicked away to mid-wicket by Kallis. That's the end of the over and it's a good start from the skipper.
short and straight once more, pulled away easily to deep square leg.
Smith comes down the track and gets an inside edge onto his own boots, that could've hurt.
straight over the top, hasn't got all of it though, only gets a single, must've hit the toe-end of the bat.
driven straight back to the bowler, miss-timed a bit.
angled down to third man, gets an easy single.
half-volley, driven straight back past the bowler and the umpire has to get out the way as the ball racesaway to the fence.
flicked to mid-wciket. Mix-up with the running and so nearl Kallis was run out there.
driven down the ground to long-off for another easy single.
walks down the track and smacks the ball over deep mid-wicket. Big one!
solid forward defence.
pushed past the bowler and to id-on. Easy single in the end.
worked away to deep mid-wicket on the ground this time.
worked away to square leg.
good delivery, flicked to mid-wicket.
attempted slog-sweep from Kallis, missed completely though.
driven down the ground to long-on.
swept away to deep square leg fence.
worked down to the long-off fence and that also brings up the half-century for the Proteas' skipper, Graeme Smith.
brushes the pads as Smith attempts a sweepshot.
Kallis gives himself some room and smacks the ball through cover-point region.
driven down to long-off and walks an easy single.
worked down to long-on this time around.
flicked to mid-wicket to bring up the 100 for South Africa.
nudged away to deep square leg
defended off the frontfoot.
rotaes the strike by driving the ball down to long-on.
swept away but fielded well by short 45.
this time Kallis sweeps the ball away powerfully to the shorter boundary and gets the maximum.
defended off the frontfoot.
soid forward defence to end off the over.
defended off the front foot.
gone! Smith goes for the big sweepshot and drags his foot out of his crease, Taibu takes the bails off in a flash and Smith has to go.
gets off the mark first ball.
flicked away to deep square leg.
solid forward defence.
another single, rotating the strike by driving the ball down to long-on. Good over for Zimbabwe.
quick single taken, big appeal for a run-out but kallis got home easily.
flicked away to short 45.
solid forward defence.
swept away beautifully and square to bring up another half-century.
run down to third man.
rotating the strike again to end off the over.
defended away to mid-wicket
driven down to long-off.
worked out to deep cover for antoher single.
driven to cover this time.
short and straight, driven down to long-on.
jubilation from Ray Price as he gets De Villiers to play around one of his deliveries.The ball hits middle and leg and De Villiers has to go.
solid forward defence.
defended off the frontfoot once more.
defended off the backfoot this time.
turned away to mid-wicket to end off the over. another good one from Price and excellent one for Zimbabwe.
shortish and wide, Kallis hammers the ball through cover-point and out to deep cover.
driven straight to cover off the backfoot.
a bit down leg, Duminy gets a bit of bat on that and they ball runs down to fine leg for a couple.
turned away to mid-wicket this time around.
full and straight, driven to mid-on.
dot ball to start off the over, shortish and straight and defended off the backfoot.
driven straight to cover.
driven to cover once more.
this time Kallis drives the ball down to long-on, gets a single as reward.
swept away hard to long leg ,but only manages a single.
swept again to long-leg. Only a single though as some good fielding restrict the South-Africans.
solid forward defence from Kallis.
driven straight back to the bowler.
short and wide, cut away powerfully to the backward point fence.
full and straight and driven straight back to the bowler.
driven back to the bowler once more.
worked out to long-on.
tickled around the corner but well-fielded.
attempted reverse sweep, missed, shout for LBW, but must've gotten outside the line of off-stump.
driven down the ground to long-on.
pushed down the ground to long-on.
driven straight back to the bowler to end off the over.
driven powerfully down to long-off for an easy single.
swept past short 45 and the ball runs down to fine leg.
flicked to square leg.
driven down the ground to long-off.
attempted slog-swep from Duminy.
solid forward defence.
worked out to deep cover.
driven out to mid-on.
driven down to long-on.
flicked past the keeper and gets an easy couple.
pushed down to long-on by Kallis for an easy single.
perfectly executed reverse-sweep, they ball races down to the third man fence. That also brings up the Proteas' 150.
huge slog-sweep from Duminy and the ball just goes and goes and goes. That's HUGE!
worked to square leg for a single. Well played by Duminy.
beautiful delivery, very full and Kallis nearly loses his off-stump.
full again, driven to mid-on, some good fielding saves the boundary.
off the pad and down to fine leg, just a bit too straight from Jarvis first up.
full and straight, driven straight to cover.
shortish and straight, cut out to cover-point.
driven out to cover, good over so far from Jarvis.
full-toss, very straight and worked past mid-wicket and out to the long-on fence for an easy couple. Good fielding and quick return from Zimbabwe.
flicked away over the top of square leg. Kallis taking on Jarvis every time these two clash and at the moment Kallis seems to be winning every battle.
worked away to deep square leg for an easy single.
turned away to deep square leg once more, just a bit too straight here.
defended off the backfoot into the gap at cover and an easy single is scored.
just rotating the strike here, this time turned to square leg and walks another easy single.
angled down to third man, some good hard running gets them a second run and that brings up the 50 Partnership.
short and straight, pulled out to the deep midwicket fence.
powerful reverse sweep perfectly executed.
knocked away to square leg for another single.
worked away to point off the backfoot.
wide down leg, Duminy attempts no shot and Taibu can't get a hand on it.
attempted sweep, hits the forearm, thus not givin wide down leg.
another dot to end off the over as Kallis drives the fullish delivery straight back to Cremer.
big appeal for a catch down leg, not given as wides either though, must've brushed the pads or thighpad.
turned away to square leg and they scamper a quick single.
shortish and wide and cut out to deep cover point.
driven down to long-off.
Duminy comes down the track and then works the ball to mid-wicket for an easy single.
worked down to third man with an open face.
short and into the stomach, might just have knocked his wind out. Miss-judged the slower delivery.
angled down to third man once more.
worked to point, no runs there this time though.
driven down the ground to long-on for another easy single.
wide outside off, very short and very far outside off.
short and straight, worked down to fine leg for a single and retains strike for the next over.
full and straight, swept away fine to the fine leg fence.
a single to rotate the strike.
solid forward defence.

and Kallis has gone and chuccked away a century. Goes down the track and attempts to smack the ball over the top of mid-off. Gets a thick edge and is caught by short 45 on the offside. A very good innings comes to an end.
solid forward defence first up.
driven straight back to the bowler.
worked around the corner to short 45
worked away to square leg for a single to get the new batsman on strike.
pushed down to long-on and rotates the strike once more.
ful and straight and defended off the front foot .
attempts to guide the ball down to third man, misses, but nearly edged that one.
quick single taken to mid-wicket.
short and wide, cut past cover-point.
wide down the leg-side.
attempted cover-drive, gets a thick inside edge and in the end gets a single to square leg.
short and straight, drop-and-go from Duminy as he just pushes the ball to the leg-side about 4 metres off the pitch.
short and outside off, cut away powerfully to cover-point.
short again, guided down to third man.
cut away to cover point once more.
short and wide and Duminy hammers the ball through cover to the fence and Duminy gets another half-century.
follows up with a single out to deep midwicket.
rotates the strike once more as he drives the ball down to long-off and gets a single.
pushed out to cover for another easy single.
solid defence off the frontfoot.
defended off the frontfoot once more.
worked down to third man.
driven straight to mid-off.
short and straight, pulled away powerfully for a boundary.
driven down to long-on for a single to end off the over.
very short and very bouncy, gone high over the batsman and the keeper.
defended to the off-side for another quick single.
no shot offered to the good line and length delivery.
half-volley outside off, Petersen hits a beautiful square drive through the covers.
slower delivery, beatsPetersen as it confuses him with the speed.
driven down to long-off.
worked away to third man for a single.
short and straight, Duminy misses out on the pull-shot, gets a little edge into his stomach.
driven straight to mid-off.
driven down the ground for another single.
driven out to mid-off this time, another easy single is easily run.
carved out to cover-point.
LBW. That's deadstraight on it's way to the middle of middle-stump. Petersen has to go back to the changerooms and Price gets another wicket.
driven back to the bowler.
defended off the frontfoot this time.
driven down tolon-off off the backfoot.
swept out to the deep square leg fence.
solid forward defence.
worked away to deep square leg.
driven down to long-on once more.
well bolwed just outside off, appeal for caught behind, seems to be some deflection but not out.
ficked away to long-on.
slower ball gone wrong, just doesn't get it out of the hand too well.
half-volley right on middle stump.worked away to long-on once more.
orker, digged out and gets a single to mid-on.
big one to bring up the 250 struck powerfully straight over the top.
worked away to square leg.
cut to point, no single there.
pulled away to deep mid-wicket.
another reverse sweep that goes to the fence.
carved away over backward point.
another single to rotate the strike.
driven down the ground.
swung away to deep mid-wicket.
full-toss, flat hit down to long-on only just falling short of the fence.
another full-toss. Driven down to long-on.
short and straight and slow, pulled down to long-on for yet another single.
Morkel comes down the track and attempts the big one, Doesn't get hold of it,went low and flat and Mazakadza takes a comfortable catch on the deep mid-wicket fence.
rotates strike and gets Boucher ,the new man, on strike.
swept fine past short 45 and Boucher gets off the mark with a boundary.
easy single in the end for Boucher to keep the strike.
driven straight back to the bowler.
forward defence.
worked away off his legs past short 45.
Duminy goes over the top and is dropped down at long-on. mpofu a bit slow to react and in the end had to take a very difficult low-catch.
worked out to the long-on fence.
worked away to mid-wicket.
big one over deep sqaure leg, Boucher picks it up and helps the ball over the fence.
Boucher goes inside-out and miss-times it a bit, Cremer just can't get to the ball down at long-on.
worked away through the covers.
big appeal for a run-out. But Boucher is safe.
driven back to the bowler.
full-toss and Duminy powers the ball to the mid-wicket fence.
worked away to the off side for a single.
punched to cover off the backfot and a quick single brings up the 300.
half-volley and Duminy hammers the ball through cover for another boundary.
single takes him to 99 as he whips the ball to deep mid-wicket.
Boucher comes down the track and Mpofu responds by bowling a bouncer.
and Duminy gets his maiden ODI century with some overthrows. But what a great innings thi has been, taking only 82 deliveries.
launched over extra cover, one-bounce four.
full-toss, thick inside edge runs to short fine leg. Well fielded by Price, using his body to save the boundary.
big one. Full-toss, slightly miss-timed by Boucher but got enough on it to clear the shorter boundary. Went very high.
driven out to long-off for an easy couple.
muscled out to deep square leg.
driven powerfully straight past the bowler, umpire luckilly gets out of the way.
slower ball, miss-read by Boucher and miss-timed, but drops short of the man on the deep mid-wicket fence.
hammered to deep mid-wicket, miss-timed slightly and gets an easy couple.
another slower delivery, hit the ball to mid-wicket again.
comes down the wicket and hits it out to the cover boundary. Boucher to face the last delivery.
bouncer, a good one too. Dot ball then off the last delivery. The Proteas end on the highest ever score on Centurion for an ODI - 331 for 5.

inn2.comm: play and miss first up.
another swing and miss from Masakadza
defended off the back-foot.
driven to mid-off off the back-foot.
no shot offered to Tsotsobe's first delivery.
no shot offered once more.
once again no shot is offered.
defended away to cover-point this time.
short of a length and straight. Defended off the front-foot. Appeal for LBW, but thick inside edge on that one.
another maiden. Zimbabwe still failing to score after two overs.
and Zimbabwe loose their first wicket. Thickish outside edge flies to Kallis at 2nd slip who dives to his right and takes a good low catch.
half-volley just outside off and Taibu hits a beautiful cover-drive to get off the mark first ball.
short and wide, Taibu hammers the ball over cover-point.
wild swing from Taibu this time, ball stayed a bit low.
good delivery this time. Good leave from Taibu too.
no shot offered once more.
no shot offered.
driven straight to mid-on.
what a great catch by Kallis at 2nd slip diving far to his right after Taylor got a thickish edge. Taylor departs without scoring.
defended off the backfoot.
short and widish, goes for the big cut over point.
swing and miss, good movement from the seam. Nearly got the edge there.
thickish edge down to third man
worked down to fine leg once more.
good quick bouncer from Langeveldt this time. One for the over.
no shot offered once more.
straight drive straight back to the bowler.
driven through mid-wicket and gets an easy couple.
worked down to third man who takes it on the second bounce.
no shot offered from Taibu.
wide outside off, swing and miss.
another swing and miss.
driven over cover beautifully, stops just short of the fence.
short and straight, defended off the backfoot.
good diving save from McLaren at mid-off to save a boundary after a great drive from Matsikenyeri.
driven over cover-point. Smased into the advertisement-boards.
solid forward defence.
worked away to deep square leg.
defended solidly off the backfoot.
short and straight, attempted pull, gets a thick top edge and the ball flies to the fine leg fence.
driven square but straight to point.
defended away to the covers.
thick leading edge falls safe.
defended away to cover.
straight drive from Taibu, the bowler gets a hand on the ball though.
worked down to third man with a thick edge.
swing and miss
no shot offered this time around.
cut straight to de Villiers at point.
defended off the backfoot.
defended off the backfoot.
duck under the short one, dropped the hands well.
short and just wide enough and Taibu hammers the ball past point to the fence.
bouncer, Taibu ducks under it with ease.
short of a length, angling away and nipping back towards the batsmen. Good delivery.
worked away to deep square leg.
good bouncer, quite unsettling.
driven straight to mid-on.
no shot offered and very nearly loses his off-stump.
driven off the backfoot straight to cover.
punched out to cover off the backfoot.
gone, Boucher dives far to his right after moving to his left in anticipation but then Matsikenyeri gets the deflection off his gloves trying to duck under the bouncer. Great catch.
nearly flicks another one to Boucher down leg, just can't get there.
flicked straight into the hands of Graeme Smith at 1st slip. Looks like something out of a slip-catching practise session. just guided straight into Smith's hands.
turned away to deep square leg.
defended off the backfoot.
no shot offered as Coventry pulls his bat out of the way.
no shot offered once more.
no shot offered again.
defended off the backfoot.
defended off the backfoot once more.
play and miss, beauty from McLaren.
no shot offered.
half-volley, driven straight to mid-off.
no shot offered from Taibu once more.
defended off the backfoot once more
no shot offered once again.
and Boucher puts it down diving far to his left after Taibu gets a inside edge. Very difficult chance, one has to say that that was stopped quite well even.
no shot offered.
no shot offered.
bouncer, ducked well under it.
play and miss, nearly gets an edge there.
defended off the backfoot once more.
thick edge justflies past the slip-courdon and runs down to the third man fence.
driven straight to extra-cover off the backfoot.
worked down to third man.
thick top edge and the ball flies to fine leg but falls safe.
driven to mid-off off the backfoot.
defended off the backfoot once more.
pulled awy to mid-on.
play and miss to a beautiful bouncy delivery from McLaren.
flicked to mid-wicket once more
driven straight to mid-off again.
short and straight, pulled away in front of square to the mid-wicket fence. good shot.
driven powerfully but straight to cover unfortunately.
dot ball to end off the over, no shot offered once more.
driven to cover who missfields off the backfoot.
worked away to square leg.
run down to third man.
driven powerfully again, this time straight to mid-off.
pushed just off the square to mid-wicket.
defended to cover off the backfoot..
defended off the frontfoot. Nearly a LBW there.
driven back to the bowler.
driven to cover of the backfoot.
sold forward defence.
driven out to deep extra cover.
what a great catch by De Villiers at cover-point. The ball was hammerd straight to him but still took a great catch.
defended off the backfoot.
shortish ball darting back at the batsman, nearly chops it on.
hangs the bat outside off, but doesn't make contact. Only just beats the edge.
another play and miss.
defended off the backfoot.
defended off the frontfoot.
driven straight back to hte bowler.
worked away to the on-side.
defended off the frontfoot.
defended solidly off the backfoot.
just a bit too straight and the ball flies to square leg after rapping the pads.
defended off the backfoot, hit on the thigh.
powerfully struck through the cover after Morkel dishes up a half-volley just outside off, asking to be hammered.
cut powerfully straight to cover.
ever so close to chopping that onto his stumps, but the ball runs away to the fine leg fence.
comes down the track and defends off the frontfoot.
driven straight back to the bowler.
another wicket for the Proteas, this time Utseya plays back to a delivery that keeps low and the ball hits him on the pads and that wasn't going to miss leg stump by one bit.
gets off the mark by pushing the ball out past cover.
flicked away to square leg.
ful-toss down leg, flicked down to fine leg.
short and straight, drops the hands and gets out of the way.
worked down to third man for an easy single.
flicked over the top of square leg.
another short one, drops the hands again and swerves out of the way.
defended away to backward point.
tickled around the corner to short 45.
worked away to backward point off the frontfoot.
flicked to square leg this time.
nearly another lbw on the card, plays all around that one.
through the gap, backward of point and runs to the boundary.
worked out past cover.
short and straight into the body of Cremer, hit on the thigh-pad.
short and outside off, smashed over the top of cover.
turned away to deep square leg off the frontfoot.
defended well off the backfoot.
bouncer, ducked well under it.
Charl Langeveldt takes an easy return catch hit straight into his hands on the follow through.
solid forward defence.
chases after a wider, slower one and nearly gets the edge.
worked away to midwicket.
beautiful reverse sweep from Taibu, bringing up another half-century for the little man.
drivendown the ground to long-off.
defended off the frontfoot.
worked away to quare leg where Smith does some good fielding.
finally Langeveldt gets the big wicket. Taibu is dismissed for the first time this series after another good knock. Should be a very big contender for man of the series.
no shot offered by Jarvis.
no shot offered once more, JArvis looking very uncomfortable with a bat in his hands.
driven out to cover, not taking a single.
edged, but just falls short they think. This will be refered upstairs. Given not out by the third umpire.
missed drive there,
driven straight back to the bowler
defended off the frontfoot.
defended off the frontfoot once more.
driven past the bowler and down to long-off.
swing and miss from Langeveldt
short and straight, pulled away powerfully to the short fence for a maximum.
driven through the covers.
defended to the offside
scooped up over the bowler's head but drops short of mid-on.
smashd through the covers
no shot offered.
attempted late cut, nearly gets the edge.
attempted defence to the on-side, gets rapped on the pads and gets a leg-bye.
short and straight, bouncer, well directed.
short of a length and just outside off.
single down to third man for Jarvis.
worked away for another single.
worked down to third man.
defended off the frontfoot.
carved away square on the off-side to deep extra cover.
attempted slog-sweep, missed and hits the wickets.
solid forward defence.
defended away to point.
driven to mid-on even though it was horribly timed.
edged away past the slips and runs to the third man fence.
swing and miss.
yet another swing and miss.
well-directed bouncer.
thick edge down to third man.
thickish edge down to third man.
turned away to mid-wicket.

and the final wicket for the series falls as Jarvis tries to clear McLaren at mid-on but fails to do so. South Africa thus wins this match by 212 runs and takes the series 2-0. Thank you for having joined us for this ODI series.
